Authors: Lamarck Rocha, Patr√≠cia Luz Ribeiro, Alessandro Rapini
Title:
A lineage-based infrageneric classification of Turnera
(Turneraceae)
Abstract:
A recent comprehensive molecular phylogenetic study of
Turneraceae showed that Turnera, the largest genus of the family, should
be recircumscribed and internally divided into eleven series. Here, we
propose a lineage-based classification for the genus, including the
description of two new series, ser. Crestatae and ser. Rinoreifoliae,
and a new subseries in ser. Turnera, the subser. Macronectariae. A list
of species and a key for series and subseries of Turnera are
provided.
